attributes.action: Keep olympic sport venues open to encourage healthier Generation of children and to keep them offthe streets
attributes.additional_details: Keep the olympic venues open rather then tearing them them down wasting money already spent. The governament want children to be active and healthier. the olympic venues built for the olympics should be kept open not taken away to encourage a healthier Generation of children and keep them off the streets. These olympic champions are role models to our children to stay healthy and active....SAVE THE OLYMPIC VENUES
